channel.title: Karim Abdel Hamid's Blog
channel.description: Welcome to Karim's Blog! Here, we'll take about Computer Graphics, Game Engines, Web Design, and general Computer Science, as well as any other thoughts I might have.

item.title: Welcome to my Blog!
item.description:
Hey there, and welcome to my first blog post! I’m Karim Abdel Hamid, a Computer Engineering student at the American Univerity in Cairo. I’m currently working on my game engine, Grindstone. I’m also co-developing Oak.js an web-based assembler, disassembler and simulator for RISC-V and MIPS.

In this blog, I plan to talk about:

  • Grindstone’s progress updates, including feature highlights
  • Oak.js progress updates
  • Various other projects
  • Computer Graphics Tutorials
  • Game Engine Tutorials
  • Whatever else is on my mind

I know not everything is interested in everything so you can search by category.
